title: Mystic Celt Treasures- CLADDAGH CAR CHARM - 7" Irish Suncatcher, Handmade USA, Gift Wrapped, Irish, Ireland, Claddagh, Celtic Knot, Irish Gift, Irish Décor, Irish Car Accessory
features: This Lovely Suncatcher is 7 inches in length from the crystal ball to top of the ornate hook
10mm Genuine Austrian Crystals Burst into Vibrant Emerald Green when the light hits them. Pictures just can not capture this
The 20mm Faceted Crystal Ball -about the size of a quarter-makes Beautiful Rainbows around the car when the sun hits it
I use only the Finest Quality Materials on my products
All Materials are Lead, Nickel, & Cadmium FREE
description: This ornament is 7 inches long The Faceted Crystal Ball is 20 mm – the size of a quarter The Emerald Green Faceted Crystals are 10 mm Genuine Austrian The Charm is 49 mm or 2 inches. The Claddagh is a traditional Irish symbol which represents love, loyalty, and friendship. The Celtic Triangle Knot at the top of the charm is also known as a Triquetra, Triquet, or Trinity Knot. It’s an ancient Celtic three-pointed symbol representing three-way unity. The Power of Three is one of Protection, Prosperity, and Good luck. FENG SHUI CRYSTALS: Faceted Crystals (such as the Crystal Ball attached to this suncatcher) promotes Love, Good Luck, and Money. CAR CHARM; Hanging a faceted crystal ball in your car helps to disperse negative energy that is exerted from the external surrounding environment. This will help to clear the energy and enhance travel luck to minimize accidents. DISPLAY SUGGESTIONS: Hang in front of a window or attached to one with a suction cup hook, on your patio, from a tree in your garden, on a chandelier, hanging light, or a ceiling fan in your home. In essence, anywhere that is brightly lit. Feel free to browse my page Mystic Celt Treasures to see more of my Handmade Products
